title: Business Card, "NeXt, Inc.", 1986
medium: Offset lithograph on cream card stock
inscribed: Imprinted in black, center left:  Leo Hourvitz/Software Engineering; upper right, on diagonal in red, orange, green and pink (respectively):  Ne/Xt; lower right quadrant:  NeXT, Inc./3475 Deer Creek Road/Paolo  Alto, California 94304/ 415 424 0200/415 424 04756 (Fax)
description: Business card for NeXt, Inc., employee Leo Hourvitz, software engineer.  In upper right quadrant; NeXT logo in shape of cube with firm name, below which is name and address of company and contact numbers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, "NeXt, Inc.", 1986.
1986. Offset lithograph on cream card stock. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-51.
